articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from International Committee of Red Cross
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from International Committee of Red Cross
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC).
					The gift was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday by Peter Maurer, president of the ICRC, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets ICRC President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets ICRC President
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday met and had a talk with Peter Maurer, president of the International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC), and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Textile Mill, Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Textile Mill, Schoolchildren's Palace
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and members of his embassy visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill Thursday on the occasion of the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					The visitors were briefed on the history covered by the mill under the wise guidance of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu before going round a room dedicated to the education in revolutionary history and the room dedicated to the history of the mill.
					
					Looking round various production processes, they admired high enthusiasm of the workers to increase production to contribute to the building of an economic power and the improvement of people's living standard.
					
					They also toured the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					They went round several hobby groups' rooms in the palace and watched an art performance given by children.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Women's Union Members Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Women's Union Members Held
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of women's union members "Long live the victory of the great Songun" took place at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Thursday to mark the 53rd Day of Songun.
					The participants presented beautiful dances to the tune of songs including "Our General Is the Best", representing the boundless reverence for the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					The venue of the dancing party turned more cheerful when the band played "Cuckoo on the Road to the Front" and "Song in Praise of Women in Songun Era" reflecting the pride of the women who have become flowers and revolutionaries in the Songun era.
					
					The dancing party reached its climax when the song "Our Leader Loved by the People" resounded forth at the plaza as it fully reflects the great honor and happiness of the people ushering in a great heyday in socialist construction, holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.

articles.title: Pyongyang Musical Instruments Exhibition to Be Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Musical Instruments Exhibition to Be Held
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The 7th Pyongyang Musical Instruments Exhibition is to be held from August 29 to September 3.
					Attending it will be musical instrument factories, researchers, instrumentalists, individual makers of musical instruments and teachers and students in the field of art education as well as quality control officials.
					
					According to Choe Yong Nam, a department director of the Ministry of Culture, overseas Koreans and foreigners related to manufacturing musical instruments can take part in the exhibition.
					
					On display will be national musical instruments and home-made western musical instruments, articles and parts of instruments, tools for manufacturing instruments, domestic and foreign technologies for manufacturing instruments and newly-discovered ancient Korean musical instruments.
					
					There will be experience-sharing meeting, seminar and concert during the exhibition.
					
					The jury will be made up of professionals and amateurs and the organizing committee for exhibition will award diplomas and prizes to units and individuals that exhibit excellent instruments.

articles.title: Production of Vehicle Accessories Doubled
articles.content:
Production of Vehicle Accessories Doubled
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The workers of the Rahung Railway Factory of the DPRK have increased the production of accessories of vehicles.
					As of August the production was doubled from the same period last year.
					
					The workers of the steel casting shop and the steel shop have dovetailed links between processes and drawn on rational working methods, thereby increasing the production of steel castings.
					
					The workers of the material shop are ensuring timely production and supply of a variety of materials by putting latent reserves to effective use.
					
					The workers of youth shop nos. 1 and 2 and other shops are actively waging the socialist emulation drive for increased production.

articles.title: DPRK's Exhibits Popular among Foreign Businessmen
articles.content:
DPRK's Exhibits Popular among Foreign Businessmen
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Among the participants in the Rason International Trade Exhibition, there are 33 companies from the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, including nine in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone.
					The Korea Zinc Industry Group and Korea Magnesia Clinker Industry Group came with zinc oxide and gem cutting craftworks, which are exported mainly to China and Switzerland.
					
					The Ryonha Machinery Company displayed more than 200 cutting tools in ten kinds, which have come under the spotlight of foreign businessmen.
					
					The Industrial Art Technology Joint-Venture Company put on display varieties of industrial designs and trademarks.
					
					The Corporation of Special Zone for International Tour of Mt. Kumgang came with over 1,000 exhibits, including brake, agaric and dried fruits of matrimony vine and bee milk gathered in forests in Onjong-ri, Kosong County, Kwangwon Province where Mt. Kumgang stands.
					
					In particular, fishery products, essential foodstuffs and other foodstuffs, presented by companies in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone, have made a big deal during the exhibition.

articles.title: Unryul Mine Technologically Updated
articles.content:
Unryul Mine Technologically Updated
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A project for technologically updating a sieving yard of the Youth Mining Area of the Unryul Mine was carried out with success, providing a guarantee for producing more ores and concentrated ores of high grades.
					The mine introduced advanced methods to the sieving work. It increased clod ore yield and consumed electricity 50 percent less, ensuring easy operation of equipment.
					
					It excavated earth for installing large equipment including crushers in a week and carried out daily quota for steel work and concrete tamping over 120 percent.
					
					Sieving machine systems Nos. 1 and 2 have been modernized in little over three months and ferromagnetic sieving process has been built.

articles.title: Scientific, Technological Presentation in Footwear Industry Field Held
articles.content:
Scientific, Technological Presentation in Footwear Industry Field Held
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation in the field of footwear industry took place in Wonsan, Kangwon Province on August 21 and 22.
					Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers, Three-revolution Team members and skilled workers in the field of footwear industry.
					
					The presentation heard papers dealing with achievements made in producing quality shoes of various patterns to meet the increasing demand of the people for better shoes and their aesthetic taste.
					
					Introduced there were successes and experience gained by the Ryuwon Shoes Factory, Kangso Shoes Factory, Sunchon Shoes Factory and Wonsan Shoes Factory which, based on modernization of production processes by their own efforts and technology, developed new patterns of sports shoes and produced stylish and light shoes on the principle of ensuring profitability.
					
					The participants swapped experience gained in solving issues for raising the quality of shoes by scientific and technological methods and in producing shoes with patterns peculiar to their own factories, shoes which would win admiration even in international market.
					
					In the meantime, there took place at the Wonsan Rolling-Stock Complex a meeting to hear the results of the national prize contest for settling scientific and technological problems.

articles.title: Silk Yarn Production on Steady Increase at Hamhung Silk Mill
articles.content:
Silk Yarn Production on Steady Increase at Hamhung Silk Mill
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A signal boost in production was reported from the Hamhung Silk Mill.
					The mill is overfulfilling daily quotas at over 120 percent.
					
					The youth reeling shop is increasing production by ensuring full-capacity operation of equipment through their good maintenance.
					
					Its workers are carrying out their plans by waging brisk socialist emulations among work-teams and machines and introducing rational work methods.
					
					The workers of Reeling Machine Shop No. 2 succeeded in improving reeling machines in a short span of time by pooling creative wisdom with technicians. They are registering signal successes in production by operating machines as required by standard working methods and technological regulations.
					
					The mill is paying deep attention to preserving and taking care of cocoons.
					
					The mill is putting further spurs to production to greet the 65th anniversary of the DPRK with increased production.

articles.title: Many Construction Projects Progress Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Many Construction Projects Progress Apace in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Lots of structures are springing up in the DPRK to contribute to the building of an economic power and the improvement of the standard of people's living.
					The construction of a world-class ski resort is now under way in the area of Masik Pass.
					
					Soldier-builders provided a sure guarantee for finishing the construction before the anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea this year, though it would take more than ten years at an ordinary pace, by giving full play to the spirit of "At a go". 
					
					The second-stage Huichon Power Station (Chongchongang Cascade Power Station), the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station, the Orangchon Power Station, the Wonsan Army-People Power Station and many other hydraulic power stations are now under construction in various places with water sources.
					
					A high-pitched drive is going on to reclaim Sepho tableland. A vast area of pasture is now being created and a large-scale stock-breeding base is under construction there.
					
					Greatly inspired by Kim Jong Il's patriotism, shock brigade members are bringing about signal innovations in reclaiming the tableland and creating pasture so as to perform feats and emerge as heroes of the era. 
					
					The members of the 618 Construction Shock Brigade are pushing forward the project for building on an expansion basis the Kosan Fruit Farm to bring earlier the day when a vast expanse of orchards of apple trees will extend far and wide at the foot of Chol Pass.
					
					A leading potato production base is appearing in Paekam County and organic compound fertilizer factories in different places. The completion of these projects would mean a great stride forward in implementing the behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who were deeply concerned for a solution to the food issue for the people.
					
					Vegetable greenhouses and mushroom production bases are also under construction in various places to contribute to improving the diet of the service personnel and people. 
					
					A waterway project is going full steam ahead in South Hwanghae Province and projects for reclaiming tideland on Ryongmae, Honggon and Nunggum islets and in Kumsong and Kwaksan are making brisk headway.
					
					The Munsu Wading Pool, the Mirim Riding Club and other places for cultural and emotional life are under construction in Pyongyang and local areas. A brisk drive is now under way to turn the Unjong science district of the State Academy of Sciences into a latest technology development district. Mushroom institutes, turf institutes and many other scientific research institutes are also appearing.
					
					The project to renovate Pyongyang Indoor Stadium to suite the aesthetic taste of the era is progressing at a final stage amid the hot wind of sports sweeping the country. The sports village in Chongchun Street, Yanggakdo Football Stadium and Nampho Stadium are being facelifted.

articles.title: "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", Faked-up Document: News Analyst
articles.content:
"Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", Faked-up Document: News Analyst
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- It has been 103 years since Japan cooked up "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" on August 22, 1910.
					The treaty paved a way for completely turning Korea into a colony of Japan.
					
					In 1905 and 1907, Japan faked up the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" and the "Jongmi Seven-point Treaty" to deprive Korea of its rights to diplomacy and home administration.
					
					The treaty was aimed at stripping Korea of its statehood that remained only in the form, and it was utterly an illegal document that had neither proper form nor legal ground suitable for a treaty.
					
					It is because the treaty was cooked up one-sidedly with no legal partner, after Japan already deprived the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910) of its diplomatic right.
					
					On the other hand, Japan fabricated the treaty in a forcible way with military threat. Prior to his death on April 26, 1926, King Sunjong told Jo Jong Gu, a royal minister, that "the ratification of the annexation was declared by Japan of its own accord in league with a group of traitors."
					
					The treaty had no legal ground to be effective, for it was not sealed with royal signature.
					
					In a nutshell, the treaty was an outcome of Japan's persistent bid for aggression on Korea.
					
					South Korea's KBS recently exposed that Japan systematically distorted Arirang, a song known to be a symbol of the Korean nation, in a bid to create an atmosphere of the annexation even before the fabrication of the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty".
					
					It was revealed that the words of Arirang, carried in an album published by a Japanese institution in 1905, were replaced with ones urging Koreans to accept the annexation.
					
					This being a hard fact, Japan has not yet repented of its crimes.
					
					Japan should liquidate its past wrongdoings as soon as possible.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Building Pyongyang into Hub of Songun Culture
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Building Pyongyang into Hub of Songun Culture
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Thursday editorially calls for turning Pyongyang into a magnificent and picturesque city and a people's paradise, enshrining Kim Jong Il's patriotism. 
					It is necessary to build Pyongyang into a world-class city befitting the capital city of revolution and dynamically step up the building of a highly civilized socialist nation, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					We should build Pyongyang into a hub of Songun culture in hearty response to the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for building a highly civilized socialist nation and give full play to the  spirit of thriving Korea dynamically advancing at the new speed of the 21st century, the speed of one-match-for-a-hundred.
					
					Supreme leader Kim Jong Un clearly indicated the orientation and ways of building Pyongyang into a hub of Songun culture while providing field guidance to the construction sites of apartment houses for scientists, Children's Hospital, Dental Hospital, Mirim Riding Club and the Munsu Wading Pool recently. 
					
					They reflect the noble intention of Kim Jong Un to turn Pyongyang into a modern and highly civilized world-class city featured by people's happiness and joy to suit the historic phase where they are to win a final victory of the Juche revolution.
					
					It is necessary to make the cultural and emotional living environment provided under the care of the WPK profusely pay off and successfully build the country into a highly civilized socialist nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for North-South Dialogue, Cooperation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for North-South Dialogue, Cooperation
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Dialogue and cooperation between the north and south of Korea is an important work to be thoroughly pushed forward to dispel the distrust and misunderstanding, promote the improvement of relations, restore the broken national bonds and achieve unity and reunification.
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article says this. It goes on:
					
					Dialogue and cooperation between the north and south are not aimed to meet the interests of only one side. They serve the common interests of both sides and help achieve the uniform development and prosperity of the nation.
					
					The June 15 era of reunification converted the north-south relations of distrust and confrontation into those of "By our nation itself" that promote the reconciliation and unity. This proved that the activation of dialogue and cooperation is a way of developing the north-south relations and opening up a bright vista for the prosperity common to the nation and the national reunification.
					
					They are not different nations that live in confrontation in the north and the south but one and the same nation which suffers from division imposed by foreign forces.
					
					Dialogue and cooperation between them are in complete concord with the requirement of the Korean nation desirous of reconciliation and peace, not of confrontation and war. They constitute the process in which both sides dispel the distrust, build trust and achieve common prosperity.
					
					The north and south should not miss a hard-won opportunity of dialogue and cooperation.
					
					It is necessary for both sides to push forward wide-ranging dialogue and cooperation in all fields, true to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					It is the firm stand of the DPRK to fundamentally improve the north-south relations and achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity by activating dialogue and cooperation.
					
					When the south Korean authorities positively respond to the patriotic appeal and measure of the DPRK, the north-south relations will turn into those of real trust, reconciliation and cooperation, far from the state of distrust and confrontation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Illegality of "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Illegality of "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty"
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Japan faked up the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" on Aug. 22 in 1910 after it got Emperor Sunjong's approval of "a commission of full power" by force in conspiracy with pro-Japanese traitors.
					Rodong Sinmun in an article Thursday cites facts to prove this:
					
					The annexation treaty is a fake document without the signature of the Korean emperor.
					
					The Japanese imperialists cooked up the annexation treaty by coercion to enforce a miserable fate of a stateless nation upon the Korean nation, a nation of time-honored history spanning 5 000 years.
					
					Japan committed indelible crimes against the Korean people.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries have denied and distorted their heinous crimes, far from honestly admitting, apologizing and compensating for them.
					
					Historically, Japan has been accustomed to the bad habit of justifying its wrongdoings, being reluctant to repent of them. 
					
					Nowadays the Japanese reactionaries have reached the extremes in their zeal for reinvasion.
					
					They have ambitiously bolstered its military muscles and hastened the preparations for reinvasion on a full scale to avenge their past defeat and realize their old dream.
					
					It is not merely a sort of technical matter for Japan to officially admit the illegality and invalidity of the annexation treaty and redeem its past crimes but a political and legal matter to maintain the fundamental principle and system of international law and consolidate global peace and security.
					
					Japan had better make a big stride towards redeeming its past crimes, though belatedly.

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Stage Actions for Vital Rights
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Stage Actions for Vital Rights
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The trade union of Hyundai Motors of south Korea staged strikes to win vital rights on August 20 and 21, according to KBS of south Korea.
					More than 40,000 unionists took part in the actions. The trade union has staged actions for wage hike since last year. Factories under the motors across south Korea staged such actions in protest against the management's rupture of negotiations for collective contract, etc. this year.
					
					The trade union of Kia Motors launched a strike on August 21 in solidarity with the strikers.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Organizations
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and Austria posted articles on their websites on Aug. 12 and 14 to mark the 68th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in its article noted that it was General Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea and eternal President of the DPRK, who put an end to the Japanese military occupation and achieved the cause of liberating Korea.
					
					Its website introduced the legendary stories praising the great personality of the President as a peerless patriot.
					
					The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK in its article titled "Songun leadership and the liberation of the country" said that the line of the anti-Japanese armed struggle laid down by Kim Il Sung correctly reflected the nature of imperialism and the situation in those days.
					
					The article stressed that the exploits Kim Il Sung performed by achieving the liberation of the country with his tireless Songun leadership would go down long in the world history of the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle.

articles.title: World Public Praises Kim Jong Un's Leadership
articles.content:
World Public Praises Kim Jong Un's Leadership
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- World public is unsparing in its praises of Songun Korea, which is greeting heyday of fresh leap forward and prosperity under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its internet website an article which said:
					
					The patriotic will of supreme leader Kim Jong Un helps the DPRK emerge as a thriving socialist nation in the world. Core basic technologies and technical engineering in important fields are making rapid progress and the country has reached a high level in latest technology. 
					
					It is the fixed will of Kim Jong Un to turn the DPRK into a thriving socialist nation both in name and reality, true to the behest of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy in an article posted on its internet website said that smiling Kim Jong Un reflects the confidence that he can surely turn the DPRK into a thriving socialist nation in the near future. 
					
					It went on: Kim Jong Un said that it is the steadfast will of the Workers' Party of Korea not to let the people tighten their belts again but help them enjoy wealth and prosperity under socialism. 
					
					The Korean people optimistically foresee the future of prosperous Korea when seeing the confident smile of Kim Jong Un leading the building of a thriving nation, and achieve fresh successes every day in building an economic power true to his leadership. 
					
					The Uruguayan paper La Juventud said:
					
					The Songun politics of the DPRK is displaying its great might not only in politics and military affairs but also in the economy and culture. 
					
					The People's Army is making a breakthrough towards developing national economy under the slogan "Let us take upon ourselves both national defence and socialist construction!"
					
					The traditional great army-people unity has reached the highest stage in the DPRK where the People's Army takes the lead in all fields and the people learn after the revolutionary soldier spirit. Multifarious events startling the world people are taking place in building a thriving nation, thanks to the indomitable mental power of the service personnel and people. 
					
					The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its internet website an article which said:
					
					The DPRK produced everything including satellite by its own efforts. Everything including a screw nail is locally produced. 
					
					All the scientists and technicians who produced, launched and controlled satellites are talents trained at home. 
					
					These facts indicate that the DPRK has strong self-supporting economy and latest science and technology. 
					
					The chairman of the Russian Blagobeshensk Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism made public an article. 
					
					It said:
					
					The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is a developed country. 
					
					The Korean people keep turning out excellent products to be proud of in the world. 
					
					The DPRK underwent a stern trial owing to the economic blockade of the imperialist allied forces and natural disasters at the end of the last century. But this was irrelevant to the political system in the country. 
					
					The Korean people, very diligent, have strong creative ingenuity. 
					
					Science and technology are rapidly developing in the DPRK. 
					
					The Guinean domestic broadcasting service said:
					
					The Korean people suffered a lot of bottlenecks and difficulties in economic construction for several decades. 
					
					Because the DPRK had to divert huge human and material wealth to bolstering up the military capability of the country due to the U.S. and other hostile forces' persistent sanctions, pressures and moves for aggression though they should have been used for economic development and improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					The Korean people are now in a position to push forward the building of an economic power as they please. 
					
					The Nepal Today said:
					
					Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. obstructed economic construction of the DPRK, threatening it with nuclear weapons. 
					
					The DPRK's new strategic line helps make a huge investment in economic construction. 
					
					The world will clearly witness the DPRK successfully building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: DPRK Birthday to Be Marked in Ecuador
articles.content:
DPRK Birthday to Be Marked in Ecuador
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- An Ecuadorian preparatory committee to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK was inaugurated in Quito on Aug. 15.
					Milton Burbano Borquez, chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including a meeting, film show and lecture on the occasion of the birthday of the DPRK, September 9.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 68th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					They included a seminar, lecture, book and photo exhibition and film shows in DR Congo, India and Guinea from Aug. 12 to 14.
					
					On display in the venues were photos documenting immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Displayed there were books and photos introducing successes made by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					Participants in film shows watched Korean films including "Invincible Korean People's Army".
					
					The chairman of the People's Revolutionary Party of the Democratic Republic of Congo said that the DPRK serves as an example to be followed by the people of DR Congo, and the DPRK is a symbol of justice and a genuine independent and sovereign state.
					
					S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, said that the DPRK turned into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence, under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					He noted that the national power of the DPRK has reached the highest level under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					Sadhna Harish, chairwoman of the Indian Study Group of Songun Politics, praised Kim Il Sung for accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation with his Songun leadership.

articles.title: CPV Veteran Publishes Travel Notes on DPRK
articles.content:
CPV Veteran Publishes Travel Notes on DPRK
Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Kang Hui, head of the veterans' group for lectures of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV), contributed his travel notes on the DPRK entitled  "Sino-DPRK friendship sealed in blood will be evergreen" to the Liaoning Korean Language Newspaper on August 13. He visited the DPRK to take part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					The author said: 
					
					Veterans of the CPV took part in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the war victory amid cordial hospitality. 
					
					Marshal Kim Jong Un took deep care of us who participated in the celebrations of the war victory day.
					
					Never to be forgotten was the day when he had a photo session with us on July 30. 
					
					Though several days have passed since we returned to China, the rousing cheers of hurrah seem to ring in my ears even now. 
					
					We veterans will always cherish in our hearts the honor of seeing Kim Jong Un several times during out visit to the DPRK and having a photo taken with him.
					
					We keenly realized the might of single-minded unity of the Korean people. 
					
					We saw the Korean people single-mindedly uphold and follow Kim Jong Un. 
					
					We learned well that the DPRK is dynamically advancing for a victory, regarding Kim Jong Un as center of leadership and unity. 
					
					We also keenly realized the tremendous might of single-minded unity of Juche Korea, Songun Korea, while watching a military parade and mass demonstration of Pyongyang citizens marking the 60th anniversary of the war victory and visiting the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					We, at the same time, keenly realized how dear the Sino-DPRK friendship is and made up our minds to contribute even a bit to carrying forward the Sino-DPRK friendship sealed in blood down through generations. 
					
					The Sino-DPRK friendship is unbreakable.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe presente del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe presente del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le enviara el Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja.
					El presidente del comite Peter Maurer, de visita en Corea, lo traslado el dia 22 al presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Peter Maurer y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Peter Maurer y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 22 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el presidente del Comite Internacional de la Cruz Roja, Peter Maurer y su comitiva que le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Premier de Congo Democratico se reune con delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
articles.content:
Premier de Congo Democratico se reune con delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Democratica del Congo, Augustin Matata Ponyo, departio el dia 19 en su oficina con la delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presidida por el canciller Pak Ui Chun, de visita en ese pais.
					En la ocasion, Augustin recordo que los lideres antecesores de la RPDC acumularon grandes hazanas ante la epoca y la historia.
					
					Felicito de todo corazon el hecho de que se logran notables exitos en la RPDC bajo la guia de Su Excelencia Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Manifesto la voluntad de desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre dos paises con larga historia y tradicion y expreso la esperanza de que se promueva la cooperacion multilateral con la RPDC.
					
					Expuso el apoyo y solidaridad al pueblo coreano que lucha por la reunificacion pacifica del pais.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion los integrantes de la delegacion coreana y el embajador coreano en el pais africano, por la parte coreana, y por la otra, el ministro interino de Asuntos Exteriores, Cooperacion y Asuntos de Francofonia y el asesor de asuntos exteriores de la oficina del premier.

articles.title: Productos coreanos centran atencion en feria de Rason
articles.content:
Productos coreanos centran atencion en feria de Rason
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- Las 33 companias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y 9 de la zona economica y comercial de Rason exhibieron sus productos en la III Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason.
					La Compania General de la Industria de Zinc de Corea y la Compania General de la Industria de Clinker de Magnesia de Corea expusieron el oxido de zinc, las artesanias de piedras preciosas y otros.
					
					Sus productos de alta calidad tienen gran aceptacion en China, Suiza y otros paises.
					
					Mas de 200 herramientas de corte de 10 tipos presentadas por la Compania de Maquinaria Ryonha son tema de negociaciones de los empresarios extranjeros y visitantes.
					
					Despiertan el interes tambien los disenos industriales y las marcas de distintos generos presentados por la Compania Comanditaria de Tecnologia de Bellas Artes Industriales.
					
					Entre ellos hay el dibujo de uniforme de trabajo que usaran los empleados del campo de esqui del monte Masik y la meseta Sepho.
					
					Pang Ryong Sim, jefa de seccion de la Compania General de Desarrollo de la Zona Especial del Turismo Internacional al Monte Kumgang, dijo a la ACNC que su entidad presento mas de mil productos incluyendo helecho, agarico y fruto de cambronera extraidos desde abril de este ano en los bosques de la comuna de Onjong del distrito de Kosong de la provincia de Kangwon donde esta situado el monte Kumgang.
					
					Agrego que distribuiria esos productos naturales a las zonas turisticas como el monte Kumgang y los exportaria a otros paises.
					
					Se venden en gran volumen los productos maritimos, alimentos basicos y otros exhibidos por las unidades que operan en la zona economica y comercial de Rason.

articles.title: Modernizada la Mina de Unryul
articles.content:
Modernizada la Mina de Unryul
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- Se llevo a cabo con exito la modernizacion del taller de cribado de la demarcacion minera Juventud de la Mina de Unryul.
					Asi se dio la garantia para producir mas minerales y mineral concentrado de alta calidad.
					
					En la mina se introdujo la criba vibratoria que permite facilitar el manejo de equipos aumentando la tasa de recogida de minerales en molde y reduciendo a la mitad el indice de consumo electrico.
					
					Se acabo en una semana la excavacion para instalar la trituradora, la criba vibratoria y otros equipos y se cumplio a diario en mas de 1.2 veces el plan de montaje de barras de hiero y el relleno de hormigon.
					
					En 3 meses y pico, quedaron modernizados los procesos de la criba no.1 y no.2. y construido nuevamente el proceso de separacion magnetica.

articles.title: Tiene lugar presentacion nacional de ciencia y tecnica de sector de industria de zapatos
articles.content:
Tiene lugar presentacion nacional de ciencia y tecnica de sector de industria de zapatos
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 21 y 22 en la ciudad de Wonsan de la provincia de Kangwon la presentacion nacional de ciencia y tecnica del sector de la industria de zapatos con la participacion de los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores, investigadores, miembros del grupo por las tres revoluciones y obreros calificados de la rama de distintas localidades.
					En la ocasion fueron publicadas disertaciones que dan a conocer los exitos logrados en la produccion de varios zapatos de buena calidad conforme a la peticion y la demanda estetica de los habitantes en aumento estableciendo el sistema de produccion de cantidad de multigeneros de zapatos.
					
					Se presentaron los exitos y las experiencias de la Fabrica de Calzados de Ryuwon, la de Kangso, la Fabrica de Zapatos de Sunchon y la de Wonsan que modernizaron los procesos de produccion y desarrollaron los zapatos de deportes de nuevo tipo con las fuerzas y tecnicos propios y producen los elegantes y ligeros zapatos.
					
					Los participantes intercambiaron las experiencias logradas en la produccion de zapatos capaces de competir en el mercado exterior.
					
					Por otra parte, tuvo lugar en el mismo lugar la presentacion nacional de calificacion de concurso con el fin de resolver los problemas cientifico-tecnicos presentados en el Complejo de Vagones de Ferrocarril de Wonsan.

articles.title: Es ilegal "tratado de anexion de Corea a Japon", insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Es ilegal "tratado de anexion de Corea a Japon", insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual divulgado el dia 22, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que el 22 de agosto de 1910, en contubernio con traidores pro-japoneses,  el imperialismo japones impuso al emperador coreano Sunjong firmar la "carta de plena autorizacion" para inventar el "tratado de anexion de Corea a Japon", documento falso carente del sello real y continua:
					Debido a dicho tratado fabricado por las maniobras coercitivas del imperialismo japones, la nacion coreana con larga historia de 5 milenios se vio obligada a sufrir el tragico destino apatrida.
					
					Japon es un pais que cometio crimenes intolerables contra la nacion coreana.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses niegan y tergiversan todos estos crimenes antieticos en vez de reconocer, pedir disculpa e indemniza por el respecto.
					
					Historicamente, Japon es un pais que tiene mal habito anacronico de no arrepentirse de sus fallos sino justificarlos.
					
					Ahora, ha llegado al climax la locura de los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					Ellos han venido intensificando las fuerzas militares para vengarse de su derrota y realizar su viejo sueno y da acicate a los preparativos de reagresion.
					
					Hoy en dia, reconocer oficialmente la ilegalidad y la invalidez del "tratado de anexion" y liquidar el pasado lleno de crimenes, no son el tema practico sino el politico y juridico para defender los principios fundamentales e instituciones de la ley internacional y consolidar la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
					
					Japon debe dar un gran paso adelante en el empeno por liquidar su pasado lleno de crimenes.
